line.text: Hi there! You seem new here!
Who are you? Where am I?
Welcome to Duckville! We're a tiny village in the middle of nowhere.
I'm Joe, the Head Camping Overseer of Duckville.
Unfortunately, we're dealing with a robot uprising right now, but I promise you that Duckville is a wonderful place to go camping!
Assuming you have a valid Camping Permit, but I'm sure you knew that already.
Yeah! It was super cool! And also really bad!
The gate to Duck City was blocked off by the robots, so we're all stuck here.
I'm not really sure how you got here.
Luckily, important services, like my Camping Overseer duties, remain operational, despite our inability to contact Duck Central Government.
Ha-ha, you're funny! No, we just respect them and praise them at every opportunity.
Say, I can't really leave my post here, but I'm realizing that I left my lucky axe at the other campsite!
Could you do me a favor and get it for me?
Since you're pretty clearly a duck yourself, I'll be generous and pay you 250 gold for your trouble!
So, what do you say? 250 gold for you to get me my lucky axe?
